Name: Falta
About the game: Falta is a survival-horror game set in a brazilian public school. Play as Davi, as you look for your missing best-friend Tiago through the dark hallways and classroms of your school. Find keys to unlock all the areas and collect 'mementos', clues about your friend's whereabouts and try to survive as a misterious and invisible monster chases after you, can you figure out what happened before the monster catches you?
Meta Title: Falta: Dec 30, 2021, Revolto Software and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Falta? Check out the release date (Dec 30, 2021), developer insights from Revolto Software, and a complete game summary.
